options.description:
Option names:
                            * withcapability (string) return only users with this capability. This option requires 'moodle/role:review' on the course context.
                            * groupid (integer) return only users in this group id. If the course has groups enabled and this param
                                                isn't defined, returns all the viewable users.
                                                This option requires 'moodle/site:accessallgroups' on the course context if the
                                                user doesn't belong to the group.
                            * onlyactive (integer) return only users with active enrolments and matching time restrictions. This option requires 'moodle/course:enrolreview' on the course context.
                            * userfields ('string, string, ...') return only the values of these user fields.
                            * limitfrom (integer) sql limit from.
                            * limitnumber (integer) maximum number of returned users.
                            * sortby (string) sort by id, firstname or lastname. For ordering like the site does, use siteorder.
                            * sortdirection (string) ASC or DESC

core_user_get_users.description: search for users matching the parameters

criteria.description:
the key/value pairs to be considered in user search. Values can not be empty.
                        Specify different keys only once (fullname => 'user1', auth => 'manual', ...) -
                        key occurences are forbidden.
                        The search is executed with AND operator on the criterias. Invalid criterias (keys) are ignored,
                        the search is still executed on the valid criterias.
                        You can search without criteria, but the function is not designed for it.
                        It could very slow or timeout. The function is designed to search some specific users.

key.description:
the user column to search, expected keys (value format) are:
                                "id" (int) matching user id,
                                "lastname" (string) user last name (Note: you can use % for searching but it may be considerably slower!),
                                "firstname" (string) user first name (Note: you can use % for searching but it may be considerably slower!),
                                "idnumber" (string) matching user idnumber,
                                "username" (string) matching user username,
                                "email" (string) user email (Note: you can use % for searching but it may be considerably slower!),
                                "auth" (string) matching user auth plugin

                                                                    'autosubmit', 'graceperiod' or 'autoabandon'.

                                                                runs out during which attempts can still be submitted,

Allows students to redo any completed question

attempts.description: The maximum number of attempts a student is allowed.

attemptonlast.description:
Whether subsequent attempts start from the answer
                                                                    to the previous attempt (1) or start blank (0).

grademethod.description:
One of the values QUIZ_GRADEHIGHEST, QUIZ_GRADEAVERAGE,
                                                                    QUIZ_ATTEMPTFIRST or QUIZ_ATTEMPTLAST.

decimalpoints.description:
Number of decimal points to use when displaying
                                                                    grades.

questiondecimalpoints.description:
Number of decimal points to use when
                                                                            displaying question grades.
                                                                            (-1 means use decimalpoints.)

reviewattempt.description:
Whether users are allowed to review their quiz
                                                                    attempts at various times. This is a bit field, decoded by the
                                                                    mod_quiz_display_options class. It is formed by ORing together
                                                                    the constants defined there.

reviewcorrectness.description:
Whether users are allowed to review their quiz
                                                                        attempts at various times.
                                                                        A bit field, like reviewattempt.

reviewmarks.description:
Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts
                                                                at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

reviewspecificfeedback.description:
Whether users are allowed to review their
                                                                            quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like
                                                                            reviewattempt.

reviewgeneralfeedback.description:
Whether users are allowed to review their
                                                                            quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like
                                                                            reviewattempt.

reviewrightanswer.description:
Whether users are allowed to review their quiz
                                                                        attempts at various times. A bit field, like
                                                                        reviewattempt.

reviewoverallfeedback.description:
Whether users are allowed to review their quiz
                                                                            attempts at various times. A bit field, like
                                                                            reviewattempt.

questionsperpage.description:
How often to insert a page break when editing
                                                                        the quiz, or when shuffling the question order.

navmethod.description:
Any constraints on how the user is allowed to navigate
                                                                around the quiz. Currently recognised values are
                                                                'free' and 'seq'.

shuffleanswers.description:
Whether the parts of the question should be shuffled,
                                                                    in those question types that support it.

sumgrades.description: The total of all the question instance maxmarks.

grade.description:
The total that the quiz overall grade is scaled to be
                                                            out of.

timecreated.description: The time when the quiz was added to the course.

password.description:
A password that the student must enter before starting or
                                                                continuing a quiz attempt.

subnet.description:
Used to restrict the IP addresses from which this quiz can
                                                            be attempted. The format is as requried by the address_in_subnet
                                                            function.

browsersecurity.description:
Restriciton on the browser the student must
                                                                    use. E.g. 'securewindow'.

delay1.description:
Delay that must be left between the first and second attempt,
                                                            in seconds.

delay2.description:
Delay that must be left between the second and subsequent
                                                            attempt, in seconds.

showuserpicture.description:
Option to show the user's picture during the

Whether blocks should be shown on the attempt.php and
